abilities.name: Source.
abilities.description: tales from the yawning portal,  page 248

abilities.name: Amorphous Form.
abilities.description: White Maw can occupy another creature's space and vice versa.

abilities.name: Corrode Metal.
abilities.description:
Any nonmagical weapon made of metal that hits White Maw corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to -5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal that hits White Maw is destroyed after dealing damage.
>White Maw can eat through 2-inch-thick, nonmagical metal in 1 round.

abilities.name: False Appearance.
abilities.description: While White Maw remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from white stone.

abilities.name: Killer Response.
abilities.description: Any creature that starts its turn in White Maw's space is targeted by a pseudopod attack if White Maw isn't incapacitated.
